segments.text: Good morning . My name is Penny White . I'm new here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to meet you . My name is Tyler Smith . Let's go to your office desk , follow me please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is your working place . Nancy will come to show you how to set up the telephones . I'm going to call her now so that you can get started . Is that OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's OK . I'm glad to get started .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you have any further questions , just ask me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are welcome . Have a nice day .
segments.speaker: S2
